list.title: Mate Routes recommends these provinces as its favorites for combining impressive landscapes, vibrant local culture, and ideal roads for traveling by car while enjoying some good mates. From the multicolored hills of Jujuy and Salta, through the vineyards of Mendoza and San Juan, to the majestic Patagonian beauty of Neuquén, Santa Cruz, and Tierra del Fuego, each destination offers unique experiences. Córdoba and San Luis stand out for their mountains, rivers, and scenic routes, while La Rioja surprises with striking natural formations. All these provinces invite you to travel slowly, stop in every corner, and enjoy the landscape with a mate in hand.
